texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Most of our services are back to normal following Christmas and New Year."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
See our Status updates map for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services for 2 January.
There are a small number of changes today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Hackney Downs and Enfield Town/Cheshunt (via Seven","Sisters) after 22:45","No southbound service from Sydenham to West Croydon from after 23:30","Weekday service on all other routes"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There will be limited regular bookings for today. Book journeys for today from Thursday 19 December","Dial-a-Ride services are for registered members only"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Black cabs will charge an extra £4 per journey","There may be an extra charge for private hire vehicles (including minicabs) - check when you book"]}
Some Santander Cycles docking stations in central London will not be available until around 18:00.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/congestion-charge\"\u003eCongestion Charge\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/ultra-low-emission-zone\"\u003eULEZ charges\u003c/a\u003e apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future%20date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2020-01-02T00%3A00%3A00\u0026endDate=2020-01-02T23%3A59%3A59\"\u003etraffic status updates map\u003c/a\u003e for 2 January"]}
All our other services are planned to run normally.
